participant_2.background:
I live in ahuge mansion.
I went to college in maryland.
I make 35 million a year.
I play for the washington wizards.
I am a professional basketball player.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1.
Hi, I'm participant_2.
It's nice to meet you.
You too.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a professional basketball player.
Wow, that's amazing! How did you get started?
I started playing basketball when I was really young. I played for my high school team and then went on to play college basketball. I was drafted by the Washington Wizards after I graduated.
That's so cool! What's it like playing for the Wizards?
It's great! I love playing with my teammates and we have a lot of fun. We're also really good, so that's always a plus.
That's awesome! Do you have any plans to retire anytime soon?
No, I'm not planning on retiring anytime soon. I'm still young and I love playing basketball. I'm just going to keep playing as long as I can.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a long and successful career.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a professional basketball player?

There are a lot of things I love about it, but I think my favorite thing is the opportunity to travel and meet new people. I've been able to travel all over the world and play basketball in some amazing places.
That's awesome! I'm sure it's a great experience.
It is. I'm very grateful for it.
So, what's your favorite place you've ever traveled to?
That's a tough question. I've been to so many amazing places. I think I'd have to say China. The culture is so different from ours and it was really interesting to experience it.
That sounds like a great place to visit. I've always wanted to go to China.
You should definitely go! It's an amazing country.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem!
